name: Earthshaker's Fury
description: From the fire in the world's heart came the land, forever sacred and eternal.
effect: Followers of Groudon may call upon 'Earthshaker's Fury' once per quest as a bonus action during their combat turn, allowing them to deal 4d6 Ground-type damage to all enemies. This damage can benefit from STAB bonuses and type-effectiveness, and scales with rank bonus.
